meanings.definition: The study of biological rhythms in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In chronobiologies, scientists investigate the daily patterns of plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in chronobiologies analyze the sleep-wake cycles of different species.
meanings.sent3: The class on chronobiologies made learning about sleep schedules surprisingly interesting.
meanings.sent4: The symphony of nature's chronobiologies plays out in the rising and setting of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The intricate dance of chronobiologies governs when flowers bloom and when birds sing.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the natural physiological rhythms of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Chronobiologies explores how our bodies follow internal clocks for various functions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in chronobiologies help patients with disorders related to circadian rhythms.
meanings.sent3: The quirky scientist in the chronobiologies lab always had a stopwatch in hand.
meanings.sent4: The symphony of chronobiologies orchestrates the heartbeat of all living creatures.
meanings.sent5: Understanding chronobiologies is like deciphering the secret language of our bodies' timekeepers.
